bug.author: hvy
bug.description:
Even when the computed gradients are wrong, the gradient check tests seem to pass. This started occurring since merge <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/commit/85372a2d909f1649a83aab4fd3c4fab0dfa6e732>85372a2</denchmark-link>
It is easily reproducible, by simply altering the outputs of some function and then running the corresponding test, noticing that the test still passes.
